articles.description: Follow live text, score updates & radio commentary from the League Cup quarter-finals including Southampton v Liverpool and Newcastle v Brentford.
articles.title: Carabao Cup quarter-finals LIVE: Southampton vs Liverpool, Arsenal vs Crystal Palace, Newcastle vs Brentford - follow live text, score updates & radio commentary - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text coverage as the PDC World Darts Championship continues at Alexandra Palace.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship LIVE: Nathan Aspinall - scores, results and updates

articles.description: As Mikel Arteta approaches his fifth anniversary as Arsenal manager, BBC Sport take a closer look at his time in charge.
articles.title: Arsenal 3-2 Crystal Palace: Mikel Arteta has rebuilt club in five years but needs to take final step

articles.description: Sandro Tonali scores twice as Newcastle move into the semi-finals of the EFL Cup with a comfortable victory over Brentford at St James' Park.
articles.title: Newcastle United 3-1 Brentford: Newcastle cruise into Carabao Cup semis

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs Bayern Munich in the UEFA Women's Champions League
articles.title: UEFA Women's Champions League: Arsenal vs Bayern Munich - scores and live text updates

articles.description: Barcelona overtake Manchester City at the top of their Women's Champions League group with a dominant victory at the Olympic Stadium.
articles.title: Barcelona 3-0 Man City: Spaniards brush aside WSL side to finish top of Champions League group

articles.description: Real Madrid ease to victory against Mexican side Pachuca in the Fifa Intercontinental Cup final in Qatar.
articles.title: Real Madrid 3-0 Pachuca: Kylian Mbappe scores in Intercontinental Cup final

articles.description: Sergio Perez is to leave Red Bull with two years left on his contract, after reaching a termination agreement with the team.
articles.title: Sergio Perez: Red Bull part ways with Mexican Formula 1 driver with two years left on contract

articles.description: India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin retires from international cricket as the seventh-highest Test wicket-taker of all time.
articles.title: Ravichandran Ashwin retires: India spinner quits international cricket at 38

articles.description: Christian Kist hits a nine-darter but loses his PDC Championship first-round match against Madars Razma.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025: Christian Kist hits nine-darter but beaten
